entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 8:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

Humidity: 79 %

Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
